channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The World Must See Gaza’s Starvation
item.description: Today, many children in Gaza are so hungry they may never recover, and our supplies are critically low.

item.title: Behind Trump’s War With Powell: A Battering Ram With 3 Million Followers
item.description: The director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency has made the removal of the Fed chair his personal mission.

item.title: How Will David Ellison Tackle the Big Problems at Paramount?
item.description: The cable business has cratered. The news division is in turmoil. A.I. is coming for movies. And those are just the obvious challenges.

item.title: Trump Flies to Scotland, Leaving Chaos Swirling in Washington
item.description: The five-day visit will be a mix of personal business and golf, with some diplomacy thrown in.

item.title: Thailand Warns of War With Cambodia as Deadly Clashes Enter 2nd Day
item.description: More than 100,000 people have been displaced in the deadliest conflict between the two nations in 14 years.

item.title: Spat Between Thai and Cambodian Leaders Fuels Deadly Border War
item.description: A personal feud between two of Southeast Asia’s political titans is inflaming the worst violence on the border in more than a decade.
